attributes.action: Raise the Minimum wage of all Private sector care home workers some of whom are working upto 12 hours without a break, and at a rate lower than the national minimum wage. A rise of atleast 6% higher than the Minimum wage would be seen as a major boost to Hard working people who spend there lives looking after people who actually fought for this country ( and didn't just come here for a free hand out)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
